metadata.name: PowerShell Base64 Encoded Reflective Assembly Load
metadata.comment: Detects base64 encoded .NET reflective loading of Assembly

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wwbsaguazgbsaguaywb0agkabwbuac4aqqbzahmazqbtagiabab5af0aoga6aewabwbhagqaka')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('saugblagyabablagmadabpag8abgauaeeacwbzaguabqbiagwaeqbdadoaogbmag8ayqbkacga')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bafiazqbmagwazqbjahqaaqbvag4algbbahmacwblag0aygbsahkaxqa6adoatabvageazaaoa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('afsacgblagyabablagmadabpag8abgauageacwbzaguabqbiagwaeqbdadoaogaoaciatabvageazaaiac')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bbahiazqbmagwazqbjahqaaqbvag4algbhahmacwblag0aygbsahkaxqa6adoakaaiaewabwbhagqaigap')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('awwbyaguazgbsaguaywb0agkabwbuac4ayqbzahmazqbtagiabab5af0aoga6acgaigbmag8ayqbkaciak')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wwbsaguazgbsaguaywb0agkabwbuac4aqqbzahmazqbtagiabab5af0aoga6acgaigbmag8ayqbkaciakq')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('saugblagyabablagmadabpag8abgauaeeacwbzaguabqbiagwaeqbdadoaogaoaciatabvageazaaiacka')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bafiazqbmagwazqbjahqaaqbvag4algbbahmacwblag0aygbsahkaxqa6adoakaaiaewabwbhagqaigapa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wwbyaguazgbsaguaywb0agkabwbuac4ayqbzahmazqbtagiabab5af0aoga6aewabwbhagqaka')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sacgblagyabablagmadabpag8abgauageacwbzaguabqbiagwaeqbdadoaogbmag8ayqbkacga')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bahiazqbmagwazqbjahqaaqbvag4algbhahmacwblag0aygbsahkaxqa6adoatabvageazaaoa'))))

output.summary: Detects base64 encoded .NET reflective loading of Assembly

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line False positive: Unlikely References: https://github.com/Neo23x0/Raccine/blob/20a569fa21625086433dcce8bb2765d0ea08dcb6/yara/mal_revil.yar, https://thedfirreport.com/2022/05/09/seo-poisoning-a-gootloader-story/
